data.title: UK Local Government On
data.text:
Local Government Web Sites in the United Kingdom

This page is divided into the following sections:

1. Councils in England (sorted by counties)

2. Councils in Wales

3. Councils in Scotland

4. Councils in Northern Ireland

5. Crown Dependencies

This list has been updated with changes made in 2023 in Cumbria, North Yorkshire and Somerset.

England

English Unitary Authorities - complete list

See also under particular Lieutenancies

Bath & NE Somerset Bedford Blackburn Blackpool Bournemouth Bracknell Forest Brighton & Hove Bristol Buckinghamshire Central Beds Cheshire East Cheshire W & Chester Cornwall County Durham Cumberland Darlington Derby East Riding Halton Hartlepool Herefordshire Hull Isle of Wight Leicester Luton Medway Middlesbrough Milton Keynes N Lincolnshire NE Lincolnshire N Northamptonshire North Somerset North Yorkhire Northumberland Nottingham Peterborough Plymouth Poole Portsmouth Reading Redcar & Cleveland Rutland Shropshire Slough Somerset South Gloucestershire Southampton Southend-on-Sea Stockton-on-Tees Stoke-on-Trent Swindon Telford & Wrekin Thurrock Torbay Warrington W Berkshire W Northamptonshire Westmorland & Furness Wiltshire Windsor & Maidenhead Wokingham York

In italics - Authorities with Council appointees, authorised to raise part of their budget by a council tax precept or by a levy on Local Authorities in the area.
